posts.post_content:
All 3 pieces are blank backed

1860's Presidential CDV SGC-Auth (SGC no longer puts a numerical grade on this issue) in a post card sized slab
They have graded 4 total, PSA zero SOLD!

1880's Goodwin Old Judge Big Head's 
Slabbed in SGC's largest holder (7.5" x 10.5") which costs $50 for 19th Century issues.
These 2 are the only ones graded by SGC - PSA has not slabbed any.

Man SGC-Auth (not sure why it did'nt garner a numbered grade) SOLD
Woman SGC-20 SOLD

PM or Email at [url]jaycos@qualitycards.com[/url]
